summary:
This mod Very simple

Face lighting
To illuminate the body
and ambient lighting
a permanent illumination,constant

The character itself and the surrounding lighting
Skin color appropriate color is used
Central lighting:Face surroundings
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][font=Georgia][size=6][i]Sima Mod[/i][/size][/font][/u][/b]
[size=4]--------[font=Georgia]More Light[/font]--------
 The face lighting along with ambient lighting
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/66629-0-1433512933.jpg[/img]

[/size][/center]
[center][size=4]This mod Very simple[/size]

Face lighting

To illuminate the body and ambient lighting 

A permanent illumination

Immobile, constant

The character itself and the surrounding lighting

Skin color appropriate color is used

Central lighting:Face surroundings
[list]
[font=Arial][color=#efefef][size=3]
******************************[/size][/color][/font][/list][/center][font=Arial][center][color=#ff0000][size=4]Look at the pictures
To see the difference:
[/size][/color][u][color=#ff7700][size=3][url=http://static-7.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/66629-1-1434793426.jpg]Ambient lighting:[/url][/size][/color][/u]
[u][size=3][url=http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/66629-0-1434793426.jpg]Face lighting:[/url][url=http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/66629-0-1434793426.jpg]

[/url][/size][/u][u][size=3][color=#ff0000][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/managevideos/?id=66629]Look at the video[/url][/color][/size][/u][/center][list]
[font=Arial][color=#efefef][size=3][center]******************************[/center][/size][/color][/font][/list]
[/font][color=#ff0000][size=3]Q:[/size][/color][size=3]Have spells like candleligth
  giving the light.
So why this mod?[/size]

[color=#ff0000]A[/color][color=#ff7700]:[/color][size=3]Because Candleligth[/size]
[size=3]  There are time limits in this spell,[/size]
[size=3]and moving in different colors[/size]
[color=#ff7700]But:[/color]
[size=3]Sima Effect gives you[/size]
[size=3]permanent lighting[/size]
[size=3]Constant lighting[/size]
[size=3]And a color close to skin sunlight[/size]

***********************

[color=#ff0000][size=5]1.4 version added:Face lighting Aim npc+Face lighting Aim npc White[/size][/color]

Make older versions of files ineffective
and deleted
After installing this version 1.4
[size=3]***********************[/size]

[color=#ff0000]Q[/color][size=3]:What does this spell?[/size]
[color=#ff0000]A[/color][size=3]:In this mod ,very dark places ,it gives enough light[/size]
[size=3]And for your face and body[/size]

[color=#ff0000]How do you get?[/color]

[color=#ff7700][size=4]You go to "[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=4]Dragonsreach in Whiterun[/size][/color][color=#ff7700][size=4]"
Visit [/size][/color][color=#ff0000]Farengar[/color]
[color=#ff7700]You buy magic  books
[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#c9daf8][u][size=4]Change log[/size][/u]
[u]Version 1.4[/u]
[list]
[*]Added Face lighting aim npc spell
[*]Added Face lighting aim npc - White color version spell
[/list]Version 1.3
[/color][list]
[*][color=#c9daf8]Added White color version spells[/color]
[/list][color=#c9daf8]Version 1.2
[/color][list]
[*][color=#c9daf8]Added face lighting spell[/color]
[/list][color=#c9daf8]Version 1.1
[/color][list]
[*][color=#c9daf8]Clean Update.esm Master file.[/color]
[*][color=#c9daf8]Changed Light radius and the ambient lighting settings [/color]
[*][color=#c9daf8]Deleted unnecessary files [/color]
[/list][size=4]----------------------------------------------------

[color=#ff0000]Notes:[/color]
[color=#ff7700]If[/color]
[color=#ff7700]you encounter any problems[/color]
[color=#ff7700]Delete old versions[/color]
[color=#ff7700]then save the game[/color]
[color=#ff7700]Exit game[/color]
[color=#ff7700]To install latest version[/color]

[color=#ff0000]Information about the mod name[/color]
Sima: Turkish name
English meaning:
visage,face,front etc.

[/size][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=4]My other Mods[/size][/color][/font]
